net.lonewolfcode.opensource.springutilities.services

Class AnnotationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.lonewolfcode.opensource.springutilities.services.AnnotationService

  • public class AnnotationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Aids in getting annotation objects from classes and their interfaces. This was created because getting annotated classes from spring dose not always return the class you created, but instead usually an implementation of it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnnotationService()

    • Method Detail

      • getAnnotationFromClass

        public static java.lang.annotation.Annotation getAnnotationFromClass(java.lang.Class annotated,
                                                                     java.lang.Class annotationClass)
        Gets the specified annotation from a class, if that annotation exists on that class or any of it's interfaces.
        Parameters:
        annotated - the class that supposedly has the annotation you're looking for
        annotationClass - the class of the annotation you're looking for
        Returns:
        returns null if no annotation was found, but returns the class object if it is found. Some casting required to get properties.

      • getCrudRepository

        public static CrudRepo getCrudRepository(java.lang.Class annotated)
        Specifically fetches a CrudRepo annotation to avoid complicated casting later in my CrudController.
        Parameters:
        annotated - A class supposedly annotated with @CrudRepo
        Returns:
        null if it's not found, a CrudRepo annotation if it is found.
        See Also:
        CrudController, CrudRepo

      • getIdField

        public static java.lang.reflect.Field getIdField(java.lang.Class annotated)
        Gets the Id annotated field from a JPA Entity object
        Parameters:
        annotated - the class which we wish to get the id field from
        Returns:
        the field if present, or null if not

      • getAnnotatedField

        public static java.lang.reflect.Field getAnnotatedField(java.lang.Class annotated,
                                                        java.lang.Class fieldAnnotation)
        retries a field from a class, that has the specified annotation.
        Parameters:
        annotated - the annotated class
        fieldAnnotation - the annotation you're looking for
        Returns:
        the field if present, or null if not
